description: Norfair is an object tracking algorithm designed to track objects of interest across consecutive frames in a video sequence. It employs a combination of techniques such as object detection, motion estimation, and data association to maintain the identity of objects over time. Norfair aims to provide robust and real-time tracking performance, making it suitable for applications such as surveillance, video analysis, and augmented reality.

metrics.precision: Depends on the specific application and tracking scenario.

limitations:
- Performance may degrade in challenging scenarios such as occlusions, fast motion, or changes in lighting conditions.
- Accuracy can vary based on the quality of the object detection and motion estimation modules.
- May require fine-tuning of parameters for optimal performance on different types of videos and objects.
